locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: When yall restore these stores you should at least leave 1 shower open especially people who reserve parking ahead of time. This is day I've been screwed by pilot
A clean shower, fresh coffee and great customer service.

Would have given it a 5* but there are some down sides. Store is nice, friendly staff showers are great. The bad is parking. The lot is a fairly decent size for store. The issue is a lot of drivers who I guess live in the area,park their ‚Ä¶

It's a pilot, has everything within short walk that we can ask for, showers were available 1pm Sunday, shower had old rag still in shower. Water pressure is moderate.  The parking though, good luck... I had to make a spot and risk it so I ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ , about the infrastructure. This is one of the worst pilots. There are no places to park a box truck or a car. Everywhere is filled with semi-trucks and trailers. The shower doesn't work. The laundry doesn't work. The food is tasteless.
‚Ä¶ The shower was super clean extra towels ‚Ä¶

Very nice people here .shower are clean .good coffee .parking lot had alot of crash .inside store very neat.  No laundromat American hotel will let you wash there but only washer and dryer.Not far from Arctic cold stage.
They have really yummy cookies the one I went to was clean it was well stocked and the bathrooms where spotless. Good rest area if you need to shower and fill up your tank and grab a bite to eat

‚Ä¶ job his doing. Always angry. Better go home and relax. I don‚Äôt know why they keep him. It takes me to take wait shower 45 minutes and it was only me. When they called me. I want to shower 4. There‚Äôs sh***t in The toilet üöΩ. Woooou. F***ck ‚Ä¶
Parking lot is a mess. Trash everywhere. No electricity to the outlet in shower #4. So the fan didn't work. No cold water in the shower. So the water temp was too hot. Place needs a good cleanup.

showerReviews.reviewText: I stopped at Love‚Äôs #842 to take a shower, and unfortunately my experience was very disappointing. After finishing my shower, I discovered that no towel had been provided. I tried calling out for assistance, even opened the door to ask, but ‚Ä¶

Rude and terrible staff the operational manager name Mark D.. wmy friend took a fountain he was in rush to shower he said I‚Äôll pay when I come back but this person started mumbling I was standing there then he started arguing with me, o he ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Friendly staff. Clean restroom. We only spent an overnight. Our camper has a shower so we did not use theirs. We parked in lot 6. we had electricity and water. Busy camper spot, so book early. Only 6 spots with E & W otherwise boondocking. ‚Ä¶

In the road a few things are important, and a clean bathroom is one of then. I stop here two times and the bathroom and the shower was really clean. When I get back in this area, I know where Im stopping by. Thank you!
Super helpful and friendly staff. Very clean restrooms and shower facilities. As truck drivers,  we stop at multiple Love's locations and this one by far has been the best!

The most disgusting place, workers staff, do not know how to talk to customers. üëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëé

they want truck drivers to pay for a shower like when you have a shower üëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëé

The manager is a disgusting person, she doesn't know her job. ‚Ä¶

This truck stop is great !
People are friendly , bathroom and shower are clean !
Must stop by for some refreshing coffee and snack !

Nice and clean shop, friendly workers. Clean shower and shower towels!!!
Thank you, guys!
Fix your shower drains! For a new spot your plumbers did a horrible job!

üöø shower  super clean and good
Hot water. ‚Ä¶

locations.title: Olson's Truck Stop
locations.content: Olson's Truck Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Kinda hard to find but did.  Showers are ok, with 2 towels, 2 wash clothes, a chair and a rug.  Water pressure was good and it stayed hot.  The staff was no overly friendly and I felt like I had to hurry.  The first shower they assigned the ‚Ä¶
Two towels, two clothes, a bar of soap, clean, friendly service, and most all I feel safe and for $11.00 a shower that's pretty dam good price RMK

‚Ä¶ is always really clean. I feel really safe here lately at night. Bought a shower today since my line is out of commission, only $11. Shower was very clean; two towels, two wash cloths and soap were available. The best truck stop shower ‚Ä¶
Felt like taking a shower at home.  Very nice and friendly.

‚Ä¶ Secondly, the showers are just like a bathroom at home. Quite literally made me feel like I was shower back home. Although could use new shower heads, something with a gentle setting and then one to massage the kinks out of your neck after ‚Ä¶
Friendly staff, nice clean shower, free parking, and tasty fresh food. I recommend the jalape√±o poppers, and the fried chicken. I will definitely be making this a place to stop when in the area.
Always stop in here when passing through. Usually, get a shower and eat at the dinner. The staff is always professional, friendly, and polite. Thanks for the great experience.

I was given shower #3‚Ä¶.. there were piles of dirty towels in a hamper in the shower room. Trash basket with used paper towels filled to the rim. Shower curtain had hard water stains and dirt. Hair in the sink. Plus the male cashier was very ‚Ä¶
Our 3 year old got car sick and they let us use the shower no charge to clean her up. We were able to buy paper towels and wet wipes. Thanks for the use of the facilities!

Nice old school truck stop, friendly people,  lots of stuff in the store, 8$ for a really nice shower and had the fish dinner at the diner which was really good... Also nice and quiet with lots of parking..... I know I'll be stopping again ‚Ä¶

locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ After spending almost $500 on fuel, it's a slap in the face to have to pay to park. I didn't bother going in to look for food or to shower, because other reviews were discouraging.  Ate microwaved Mac & Cheese, and washed up on the truck. ‚Ä¶

- Different from most of the comments here i had a good experience. Cashiers and shower cleaning people were nice, parking was full but I waited about 20 min then a truck came out and I got a free parking for the night (almost paid for it ‚Ä¶

Ok make me understand this. We fuel here and buy food here also we pay showers is all business. But you are make all your parking not to mention only 15 parkings are not reserved. All your parking is reserved for 22 dollars for each parking ‚Ä¶

Paid $15.50 for a shower that was TINY. I could get over that fact, but there was literal wads of hair on the floor and the toilet was covered in a layer of fuzz and dust that no doubt came from the fan. The fan was coated so heavily in ‚Ä¶

Shower was good. Took long for the water to run hot though. I was looking for the salad bar others are talking about but seems that bar is closed down a long time ago. The food they have now is the same as everywhere and at a higher price. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ don't have many free spots l fit in to with a long rig.  Laundry machines worked good, Mike the shower porter was friendly  as was the staff in the shop and the store.   The shower was small, it was stocked, clean and had hot water. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ happened on 7/9/2024, 10:25 PM) Already had an attitude when my co driver and I entered, I redeemed points for a shower and wanted to get a team shower when she said I couldn't because my CO DRIVER needed to be a driver and he didn't look ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ trying to make their living off the backs of a driver then there is nothing to eat here. They offer you a bottled water   to say  Thank you for giving me your money. Really it should be giving you a free shower. Give something back

Clean, very nice and helpful cashier's, I thought the showers where expensive.. Compared to others, till i entered the personal shower room, it was worth it!! 14.00 dollars and that provide shower, wash cloth, hand towel, towel floor Matt, ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ in for 34 HR break, laundry, & oil change. Very little parking, wasn't able to get a hot meal as building had issues which also prevented getting to do laundry or hot shower. Checked with shop to get oil change & they don't keep ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ and attentive waitresses.  The food is was so good with huge portions at a great price! They have 5 showers that cost $8. Which is such a great bargain because these showers were very clean and super roomy.  The water pressure was ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ You want friendly people? Excellent home cooked food? Need a CAT scale? A good clean hot shower? Need service? A truck wash? Well, you‚Äôll get that here and more! You want to pay to park? I‚Äôm sure they‚Äôll take your money, but there are no ‚Ä¶
Nice place done a 34 restart full size eat in Resurant washer dryer shower only 10.00 very clean bluding & parking lot .good place for R&R

‚Ä¶ that‚Äôs open from 7am to 9pm. Definitely recommend the bison. Food is good, nice portions and cooked to order. Service is decent too. Showers are clean and good size. Would be nice to have a light in the shower itself. Pretty dark in there.

‚Ä¶ place to stay as a truck driver in all of MN. If you want a quick hot meal and friendly conversation, a hot shower or just a quick pit stop for food, drinks or a restroom break, I would highly recommend Trucker's Inn of Sauk Cebtre, MN.

‚Ä¶ . They're fried food is cooked daily and the chicken is quite delicious, and if you need to take a shower their rates are quite reasonable compared to the other guys, plus you can't beat the relaxing convenience of the "volvo" room. I'm ‚Ä¶

This place is amazing! Lots of truck parking, awesome showers (labeled uniquely as semi brands like Kenworth and Peterbilt), and a great selection of grab and go food. Plenty of snacks and drinks as well. The employees are friendly and the ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ a coffee or soda and off you go. Also you can sit and enjoy a full meal from the menu in the restaurant which is open 24 hours after relaxing in a clean hot shower with fluffy clean towels. Seems to be plenty of parking for trucks as ‚Ä¶

Cenex Diesel Truck stop - decent large portion meals. 24hr restaurant and trucker's rest stop shower-sleep layover. Staff is very busy and place is very clean, well stocked and outfitted for every trucker/traveler need and well-run for a ‚Ä¶

Awesome truck stop, plenty of parking, plenty of food options, very nice shower and has a bath tub if that‚Äôs ur thing and ppl are super friendly working there. Nice change from the usual flying j or loves
